entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 02 May 2016
